com.interpss.core.sparse.impl

Class SparseEqnIntegerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.interpss.core.sparse.impl.AbstractSparseEquation
      • com.interpss.core.sparse.impl.SparseEqnIntegerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISparseEquation, ISparseEqnInteger

    public class SparseEqnIntegerImpl
extends AbstractSparseEquation
implements ISparseEqnInteger
    Sparse Equation of data type integer. The purpose is for arranging network bus number to minimise the non-zero fill-ins. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1
